sen.j: 西園寺 公潔（さいおんじ きんずみ、文化 (元号)15年2月1日 (旧暦)（1818年3月7日） - 天保7年5月30日 (旧暦)（1836年7月13日））は、江戸時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Kinzumi SAIONJI (March 7, 1818 – July 13, 1836) was a Court noble in the late Edo period.
Kinzumi SAIONJI (March 7, 1818 – July 13, 1836) was Kugyo (a Court Noble) in the late Edo period.
sen.cmt: Kugyoを追加し、court nobleを大文字にしました。
sen.e: Kinzumi SAIONJI (March 7, 1818 – July 13, 1836) was Kugyo (a Court Noble) in the late Edo period.

sen.j: 主に仁孝天皇（120代）の代の朝廷に仕え、官位は従三位近衛府まで進む。
sen.e: He mainly attended at the court during Emperor Ninko (the 120th) era, and he became jusanmi-konoefu (a government official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards at the Junior Third Rank).

He primarily served for the sovereign of the 120th Emperor Ninko in the Imperial Court; He was promoted up to Jusanmi-Konoefu (Junior Third Rank and Government Official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
sen.cmt: mainly→primarily、became→was promoted up toに訂正したほか、全体的に訂正しました。
sen.e: He primarily served for the sovereign of the 120th Emperor Ninko in the Imperial Court; He was promoted up to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) Konoefu (Government Official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).

sen.j: 実父は有栖川宮韶仁親王。
sen.e: His natural father was Arisugawanomiya Imperial Prince Tsunahito.
His real father was Imperial Prince Arisugawanomiya Tsunahito.
sen.cmt: natural→realに訂正しました。表記指示に従い、Arisugawanomiyaの位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: His real father was Imperial Prince Arisugawanomiya Tsunahito.
His mother was "ie no nyobo" (a lady-in-waiting).
His mother was "ie no nyobo" (a lady-in-waiting).
His mother was "ie no nyobo" (a lady-in-waiting).

sen.j: 養父は中納言西園寺寛季。
sen.e: His foster father was Chunagon (vice-councilor of state), Hirosue SAIONJI.
His adoptive father was Chunagon (Vice-Councilor of State) Hirosue SAIONJI.
sen.cmt: foster→adoptiveに訂正し、役職の頭文字を大文字にしました。役職の後のカンマを削除しました。
sen.e: His adoptive father was Chunagon (Vice-Councilor of State) Hirosue SAIONJI.

sen.j: もともとは皇族であったが、西園寺寛季の子の西園寺治季が早世したために、臣籍降下養子による臣籍降下して寛季の養子となり、西園寺公潔として西園寺家を相続した。
sen.e: He was originally a member of the Imperial Family, but since Harusue SAIONJI, a son of Hirosue SAIONJI died early, he demoted and succeeded the Saionji family.

Although he was originally a member of the Imperial Family, he demoted himself to be adopted by the SAIONJI family; For, Hirosue SAIONJI's son, Harusue died at an early age and there was no eligible successor in the family. Consequently, Kinzumi became heir to the Saionji family.
sen.cmt: 訳抜けです。養子となった部分が抜けていました。文法整理のため、全体的に訂正しました。
sen.e: Although he was originally a member of the Imperial Family, he demoted himself to be adopted by the SAIONJI family because Harusue, Hirosue SAIONJI's son, died at an early age and so he became heir to the Saionji family as Kinzumi SAIONJI.
sen.cmt: 原文にない補足は削除しました。

sen.j: 天保3年（1832年）に叙爵し、侍従・近衛府・右近衛権中将をへて、天保7年（1836年）には従三位となり公卿に列したが、同年に19歳にして薨去した。
sen.e: In 1832, he was conferred a peerage, and became jiju (a chamberlain), Konoefu (a government official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and Ukone no Gon no chujo (Provisional Middle Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), then he became jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) and he was raised to the court noble in 1836, but died the same year, at the age of 19.

In 1832, he was conferred a peerage; After he took the positions of Jiju (Chamberlain), Konoefu (Government Official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and "Ukone no Gon no chujo" (Provisional Middle Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), he became Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) in 1836, which gave him the title Kugyo; Nevertheless, he died at the age of 19 in the same year.
sen.cmt: 役職の頭文字を大文字にしました。複数の単語で連なる役職に""をつけました。文法整理のため、語順や単語を入れ替えました。
sen.e: In 1832, he was conferred a peerage; After he took the positions of Jiju (Chamberlain), Konoefu (Government Official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and "Ukone no Gon no chujo" (Provisional Middle Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), he became Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) in 1836, which gave him the title Kugyo; Nevertheless, he died at the age of 19 in the same year.

sen.j: 西園寺家は治季の子の西園寺師季が相続した。
sen.e: The Saionji family was succeeded by Morosue SAIONJI, a son of Harusue.
Then, Harusue's son, Morosue SAIONJI became heir to the Saionji family.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に訂正しました。
sen.e: Then, Harusue's son, Morosue SAIONJI became heir to the Saionji family.
